Symbol.Script_3D:
!!! Caged_Ladder.GSM !!! Made by Graphisoft SE !!! 2004. 12. 12.
IF gs_detlevel_3D=`Откл.` THEN END IF gs_shadow=0 THEN SHADOW OFF RESOL gs_resol
PEN gs_cont_pen MATERIAL mat_ladder
! --- HOTSPOTS ---
UnID=1 HOTSPOT a/2-4",0,0,UnID :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2+4",0,0,UnID :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT a/2-4",0,zzyzx,UnID :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2+4",0,zzyzx,UnID :UnID=UnID+1
! --- EDITABLE HOTSPOTS ---
HOTSPOT -a/2+4",-7",zzyzx,UnID,sr_oh,1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2+4",-7",zzyzx-0.1,UnID,sr_oh,3 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2+4",-7",zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,sr_oh,2 :UnID=UnID+1
HOTSPOT a/2-4",-7",zzyzx,UnID,sr_oh,1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT a/2-4",-7",zzyzx-0.1,UnID,sr_oh,3 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT a/2-4",-7",zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,sr_oh,2 :UnID=UnID+1
HOTSPOT 0,0,zzyzx,UnID,lnd_w,1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT 0,-0.1,zzyzx,UnID,lnd_w,3 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT 0,lnd_w,zzyzx,UnID,lnd_w,2 :UnID=UnID+1
HOTSPOT -a/2+4"-sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2+4"-sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2-0.1,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,3 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2+4"-sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,2 :UnID=UnID+1
HOTSPOT a/2-4"+sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT a/2-4"+sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2-0.1,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,3 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT a/2-4"+sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,2 :UnID=UnID+1
! --- SIDE RAIL ---
ADDz 4" PRISM_ 4,zzyzx-4"+sr_oh, a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,15, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,15, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,15
PRISM_ 4,zzyzx-4"+sr_oh, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,15 DEL 1
! --- FOOT Connection ---
IF foot_typ=foot_typ_mtr[1] THEN !!! TO the FLOOR ADD -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,0 ROTx 90 PRISM_ 6,sr_d, 0,h_w,15, 0,6",15, h_w,6",15, h_w,0,15, -4",0,15, -4",h_w,15 ADDx a-8" MULx -1 PRISM_ 6,sr_d, 0,h_w,15, 0,6",15, h_w,6",15, h_w,0,15, -4",0,15, -4",h_w,15 DEL 4 ENDIF
IF foot_typ=foot_typ_mtr[2] THEN !!! TO the WALL ADD -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,6" block h_w, f_w, sr_d ADDx a-8" MULx -1 block h_w, f_w, sr_d DEL 3 ENDIF
! --- STEPS ---
ADD -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/4,0 FOR s=1 to n_s ADDz s*dz-rw-0.001 BLOCK a-8",sr_d/2,rw DEL 1 next s DEL 1
! --- VERTICAL CAGEs ---
IF zzyzx>=saftyLimit THEN ADDz sr_bl PRISM_ 4,zzyzx-sr_bl+sr_oh, -a/2+h_w,-13",15, -a/2+h_w,-13"-vc_d,15, -a/2+h_w+vc_w,-13"-vc_d,15, -a/2+h_w+vc_w,-13",15
PRISM_ 4,zzyzx-sr_bl+sr_oh, a/2-h_w,-13",15, a/2-h_w,-13"-vc_d,15, a/2-h_w-vc_w,-13"-vc_d,15, a/2-h_w-vc_w,-13",15
PRISM_ 4,zzyzx-sr_bl+sr_oh, -a/2+h_w,-19",15, -a/2+h_w,-19"-vc_d,15, -a/2+h_w+vc_w,-19"-vc_d,15, -a/2+h_w+vc_w,-19",15
PRISM_ 4,zzyzx-sr_bl+sr_oh, a/2-h_w,-19",15, a/2-h_w,-19"-vc_d,15, a/2-h_w-vc_w,-19"-vc_d,15, a/2-h_w-vc_w,-19",15 DEL 1
ADDy -2'1/4"-a/2 TUBE 4,5,1+2+16+32, -vc_d/2,0,0, -vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,0,0,
0,0,0,0, 0,0,sr_bl,0, 0,5",11',0, 0,5",zzyzx+sr_oh,0, 0,5",zzyzx+sr_oh+0.1,0 DEL 1
ADDy -2'1/2" ROTz 55 ADDy -a/2+vc_w TUBE 4,5,1+2+16+32, -vc_d/2,0,0, -vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,0,0,
0,0,0,0, 0,0,sr_bl,0, 0,dL,11',alfa, 0,dL,zzyzx+sr_oh,alfa, 0,dL,zzyzx+sr_oh+0.1,alfa DEL 3
ADDy -2' MULx -1 ROTz 55 ADDy -a/2 TUBE 4,5,1+2+16+32, -vc_d/2,0,0, -vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,0,0,
0,0,0,0, 0,0,sr_bl,0, 0,dL,11',alfa, 0,dL,zzyzx+sr_oh,alfa, 0,dL,zzyzx+sr_oh+0.1,alfa DEL 4 ENDIF
! --- HOOP ---
IF zzyzx>=saftyLimit THEN ADDz sr_bl PRISM_ 20,2", a/2-4"-f_w,0,15, a/2-4",0,15, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, a/2,-12",15, a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",79, -a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",1079, -a/2,-12",15, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4",0,79, -a/2+4"+f_w,0,15,
-a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",79, a/2-h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",1079, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,15, a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,15
ADDz 4' FOR i=1 to n_hoop ADDz (i-1)*4' ! PRISM_ 20,2", ! a/2-4"-f_w,0,15, ! a/2-4",0,15, ! a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, ! a/2,-12",15, ! a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, ! -a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, ! -a/2,-12",15, ! -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, ! -a/2+4",0,79, ! -a/2+4"+f_w,0,15, ! ! -a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,15, ! -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,15, ! -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, ! -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, ! -a/2+h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, ! a/2-h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, ! a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, ! a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, ! a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,15, ! a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,15 DEL 1 NEXT i DEL 2
ADDz zzyzx-2" PRISM_ 20,2", a/2-4"-f_w,0,15, a/2-4",0,15, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, a/2,-12",15, a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, -a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, -a/2,-12",15, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4",0,79, -a/2+4"+f_w,0,15,
-a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, a/2-h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,15, a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,15
! --- RAIL on the TOP ---
ADDz sr_oh PRISM_ 16,2", a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,15, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, a/2,-12",15, a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, -a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, -a/2,-12",15, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,15,
-a/2+4"+h_w,-7"+sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, a/2-h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"+sr_d/2,15 DEL 2 ENDIF IF top_rail THEN ADD a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,zzyzx ROTx 90 ROTy 90 PRISM_ 8,sr_w, 0,0.3,15, tr_oh,0.3,15, tr_oh,sr_oh,15, 0,sr_oh,15, 0,sr_oh-sr_w,15, tr_oh-sr_w,sr_oh-sr_w,15, tr_oh-sr_w,0.3+sr_w,15, 0,0.3+sr_w,15
IF sr_oh-0.3>0.4 THEN ADDy 0.3+(sr_oh-0.4)/2 BLOCK tr_oh-sr_w,sr_w,sr_w DEL 1 ENDIF
ADDz -a+4"+sr_w PRISM_ 8,sr_w, 0,0.3,15, tr_oh,0.3,15, tr_oh,sr_oh,15, 0,sr_oh,15, 0,sr_oh-sr_w,15, tr_oh-sr_w,sr_oh-sr_w,15, tr_oh-sr_w,0.3+sr_w,15, 0,0.3+sr_w,15
IF sr_oh-0.3>0.3 THEN ADDy 0.3+(sr_oh-0.3)/2 BLOCK tr_oh-sr_w,sr_w,sr_w DEL 1 ENDIF DEL 4 ENDIF
! --- LANDING Platform ---
IF landing THEN ADDz zzyzx-0.05 PRISM_ 10,0.05, -a/2+4",0,15, a/2-4",0,15, a/2-4",lnd_w,15, -a/2+4",lnd_w,15, -a/2+4",0,-1,
-a/2+5",1",15, a/2-5",1",15, a/2-5",lnd_w-1",15, -a/2+5",lnd_w-1",15, -a/2+5",1",-1
ROTx -90 n_p = INT((lnd_w-2")/0.05) n_p2= INT((a-8"-2")/0.05)
FOR p=1 to n_p+1 ADDz p*0.05 POLY 4, -a/2+5",0, a/2-5",0, a/2-5",-0.05, -a/2+5",-0.05 DEL 1 NEXT p
ROTy -90 ADDz -a/2+4" FOR p2=1 to n_p2+1 ADDz p2*0.05 POLY 4, 1",0, lnd_w-1",0, lnd_w-1",-0.05, 1",-0.05 DEL 1 NEXT p2 DEL 2 DEL 2 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_2D:
PEN gs_cont_pen FILL gs_fill_type
! --- CHECK for VISIBILITY --- bShowCage = ((ZZYZX+EPS) > saftyLimit) bCageTopView = (not(bStorySensitive) | (bStorySensitive & ((cutplaneHeight+EPS) > sr_bl)))
bShowPlatform = landing bShowRail = top_rail if bStorySensitive then if cutplaneHeight < ac_toplevel then bShowPlatform = 0 if cutplaneHeight < ac_toplevel then bShowRail = 0 endif
! --- HOTSPOTS --- unID=1
HOTSPOT2 0,0,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 a/2-4",0,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -a/2+4",0,unID :unID=unID+1 if bShowCage then HOTSPOT2 a/2,-1',unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -a/2,-1',unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 a/2,-1'8 1/2",unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,-a/2-0.515,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,-a/2-0.642,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -a/2,-1'8 1/2",unID :unID=unID+1 endif
! --- EDITABLE HOTSPOTS ---
if bShowPlatform then HOTSPOT2 0,0,unID,lnd_w,1+128 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,-0.1,unID,lnd_w,3 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,lnd_w,unID,lnd_w,2 :unID=unID+1 endif
! --- EDITABLE HOTSPOTS ---
POLY2_B 5,1+2+4,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,-1
RECT2 -a/2+4"-h_w,-7"+sr_d/2-h_w,-a/2+4"-sr_w+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2+h_w
POLY2_B 5,1+2+4,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,1, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,1, a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,-1
RECT2 a/2-4"+h_w,-7"+sr_d/2-h_w,a/2-4"+sr_w-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2+h_w
POLY2_B 4,1+2+4,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"+rw/2,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-rw/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-rw/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"+rw/2,1
! --- Safety Cage ---
if bShowCage then if bCageTopView then POLY2_B 20,1+2+4,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4"-f_w,0,1, a/2-4",0,1, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2,-12",1, a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",1, -a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",1001, -a/2,-12",1, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4",0,1, -a/2+4"+f_w,0,1,
-a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",1, a/2-h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",1001, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,1, a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,1
POLY2_B 20,1+2+4,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4"-f_w,0,1, a/2-4",0,1, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2,-12",1, a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1, -a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1001, -a/2,-12",1, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4",0,1, -a/2+4"+f_w,0,1,
-a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1, a/2-h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1001, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,1, a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,1 else POLY2_B 6,1+2+4,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4",0,1, -a/2+4"+f_w,0,1,
-a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1
POLY2_B 6,1+2+4,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4"-f_w,0,1, a/2-4",0,1, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,1, a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,1
line_type gs_LineTypeStUp
POLY2_B 14,1+4,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2,-12",1, a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",1, -a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",1001, -a/2,-12",1, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1,
-a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",1, a/2-h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",1001, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1
POLY2_B 14,1+4,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2,-12",1, a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1, -a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1001, -a/2,-12",1, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1,
-a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1, a/2-h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1001, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1
line_type 1 endif endif
! --- LANDING PLATFORM --- IF bShowPlatform THEN RECT2 -a/2+4",0,a/2-4",lnd_w
HOTSPOT2 a/2-4",lnd_w,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -a/2+4",lnd_w,unID :unID=unID+1 ENDIF
! --- RAIL on Top ---
unID = 50 IF bShowRail THEN POLY2_B 4,1+2+4,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,1, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,1
POLY2_B 4,1+2+4,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,1, a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,1
HOTSPOT2 a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,unID :unID=unID+1 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_1D:
!!! Caged_Ladder.GSM !!! Made by Graphisoft SE !!! 2004. 12. 12.
EPS = 0.0001
!!!********************* STRING PARAMETERS
dim foot_typ_mtr[2] foot_typ_mtr[1]=`К полу` foot_typ_mtr[2]=`К стене`
uiTopRail = `Ширина поручней вверху` uiLanding = `Ширина плошадки`
!!!********************* Basic Variables
!f_w =1" !!! foot depth !f_d =7" !!! side rail distance from the wall !sr_w =2" !!! side rail width !sr_d =3" !!! side rail depth ! !h_h =4" !!! hoops hight !h_w =1/2" !!! hoops width n_hoop=max(1,INT((zzyzx-sr_bl-4')/4')) if zzyzx>15' then n_hoop=n_hoop+1 ! !vc_w =1/2" !!! vertical cage width !vc_d =2" !!! vertical cage depth
!!!********************* Calculated Variables
!!!********* Steps' number n_s_temp=INT((zzyzx+0.01)/RungDist) if ABS(INT((zzyzx+0.01)/RungDist)-(zzyzx+0.01)/RungDist)<0.1 then dz=zzyzx/(n_s_temp) else dz=zzyzx/(n_s_temp+1) endif
n_s=zzyzx/dz
!!y=sqr(r^2-x^2)-5" !!y=x !!________________ !!(x+5")^2=r^2-x^2 !!x^2+10"*x+25"=-x^2 !!2x^2+10"*x+25"-r^2=0
dL=3 1/2" alfa=15
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Story Sensitive ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ac_bottomlevel = 0 ac_toplevel = ZZYZX + EPS
if GLOB_CONTEXT <> 1 then parameters ac_toplevel = ac_toplevel, ac_bottomlevel = ac_bottomlevel endif
cutplaneHeight = GLOB_CSTORY_ELEV - GLOB_HSTORY_ELEV + GLOB_CUTPLANES_INFO[1]
Symbol.Script_PR: call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="40", subpos=subpos, pos=GLOB_ID, obozn=obozn, naen=naen, ves=ves, kol_vo_spec=kol_vo_spec, komment=komment
Symbol.Script_UI:
ui_dialog `Пар-ры лестницы`,444,266
pos_x=15 ! start Position X Coordinate pos_y=5 ! start Position Y Coordinate OutfieldHgt=16 ! height of Outfield
!!! >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> !!! 1. Column >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
UI_SEPARATOR 0, 0, 444, 266
px = 60 py = 95 cx = px + 4 cy = py + 20
UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Крепл. внизу`, pos_x,pos_y, cx+30,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0
UI_INFIELD "foot_typ", pos_x,pos_y+20, cx+30, 235, 1, "LadderLegs(1)", 2, 1, 78, cy, px, py, 1, foot_typ_mtr[1], 2, foot_typ_mtr[2]
!!! >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
CellX1=cx+30 ! 1. Column Width DistCell=20 ! Dist. between Columns Pict1X=80 ! 1. Pict Width Pict1Y=70 ! 1. Pict Height
OutfieldWidth=140 ! general width of Outfield InfieldHgt=20 ! height of Infield InfieldWidth=60 ! general width of Infield Outfield2X=OutfieldWidth-InfieldWidth ! with2 of Outfield YY=20 ! distance between Outfiled
!!! >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> !!! 2. Column >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
StartCell2X=pos_x+CellX1+DistCell !! Start Position of 2. Column
i=-1 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Высота защ. огражд.`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, OutfieldWidth,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0 i=i+1 UI_PICT "CagedLadder_geom(1)", StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY,80,70,1 i=i+1 UI_INFIELD "sr_oh", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20 i=i+3 UI_OUTFIELD `Лимит безоп.`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "saftyLimit", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20
i=i+1 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Пар-ры ступенек`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, OutfieldWidth,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0 i=i+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Толщ. ступ.`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "rw", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20
i=i+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Пр-во ступ.`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "RungDist", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1,pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20
i=i+1 UI_INFIELD "top_rail", StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, 20,20 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Поручни вверху`, StartCell2X+20+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, OutfieldWidth-20,OutfieldHgt i=i+1 UI_STYLE 0,0 UI_OUTFIELD `Ширина`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "tr_oh", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20
i=i+1 UI_INFIELD "landing", StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, 20,20 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Площадка`, StartCell2X+20+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, OutfieldWidth-20,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0 i=i+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Ширина`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "lnd_w", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20
!!! >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> !!! 3. Column >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
StartCell3X=pos_x+CellX1+DistCell+OutfieldWidth+DistCell !! Start Position of 3. Column Outfield3X=OutfieldWidth-35 !!width3 of infield
UI_SEPARATOR pos_x+CellX1+2*20+OutfieldWidth-10, pos_y, pos_x+CellX1+2*20+OutfieldWidth-10, 266-5
ii=-1 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `2D-представление`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, OutfieldWidth,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0
YY=22 ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Перо контура`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield3X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_cont_pen", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-35+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, 35, 20
ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Образец штриховки`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield3X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_type", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-35+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, 35, 20
ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Перо штриховки`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield3X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_pen", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-35+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, 35, 20
ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Перо фона штр.`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield3X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_back_pen", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-35+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, 35, 20 YY=20
ii=ii+2 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `3D-представление`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, OutfieldWidth,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0
ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `3D`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_detlevel_3D", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-InfieldWidth+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth, 20
ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Аппроксимация`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_resol", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-InfieldWidth+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth, 20
ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Отбрасывание теней`, StartCell3X+20+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, OutfieldWidth-20,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_shadow", StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, 20, 20
ii=ii+2 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Покрытие`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield3X-42,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0 UI_INFIELD "mat_ladder", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-35-42+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, 35+42, 23
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types" parameters
!values "a" 0.63
values "foot_typ" foot_typ_mtr
values "A" Range[0.4,) values "RungDist" RANGE [0.15,)
values "zzyzx" Range[7',) values "sr_oh" Range[0.5,] values "sr_bl" Range[0.1,] values "tr_oh" Range[5",] values "lnd_w" Range[5",] values "rw" Range(0,) values "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Откл.` values "gs_resol" RANGE [3,) values "saftyLimit" RANGE [0,)
IF NOT(top_rail) THEN LOCK "tr_oh" IF NOT(landing) THEN LOCK "lnd_w"
if gs_cont_pen=0 then parameters gs_cont_pen=4 if gs_fill_pen=0 then parameters gs_fill_pen=19
if not(bStorySensitive) then hideparameter "gs_LineTypeStUp" lock "gs_LineTypeStUp" endif
Symbol.Comment: Лестница с ограждением и с зависимым от этажа 2D-символом.
Symbol.Keywords: Соединение внизу, платформа площадки, ограждение вверху
